# About

There are a number of different sources of fibroblast-specific markers. Here I want to curate them and get a list of markers that I can use to construct a signature matrix for CIBERSORTx.

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

## PanglaoDB

```{r}
panglao <- read_tsv("https://panglaodb.se/markers/PanglaoDB_markers_27_Mar_2020.tsv.gz")
glimpse(panglao)
```
```{r Extract Fibroblast gene list}
#panglao <- panglao[!(panglao$species == "Mm") & (panglao$`cell type` == "Fibroblasts"),]
panglao <- panglao[panglao$`cell type` == "Fibroblasts",]
panglao_fibroblast <- panglao$`official gene symbol`
```

## CellMarker

```{r}
cellmarker <- read_tsv("http://xteam.xbio.top/CellMarker/download/all_cell_markers.txt")
cellmarker <- cellmarker[grep("\\.*[F|f]ibroblast", cellmarker$cellName),]
```
